title: Atom structure - make plus 2e ion from Li atom

content.question: An atom or ion of lithium has <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> protons in its nucleus. Which of the following describes how a lithium ion with a net charge of <math alttext="positive 2 e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></math> could be obtained from a neutral lithium atom?

choices.label: Remove two electrons from a neutral lithium atom.
Add two electrons to a neutral lithium atom.
Add two protons to a neutral lithium atom.
Remove one electron and add one proton to a neutral lithium atom.

content.answer: Remove two electrons from a neutral lithium atom.
